question: Which union ministry has decided to launch Bharatiya Poshan Krishi Kosh (BPKK)?
option3: Ministry of Women and Child Development
answer: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation: The Union Ministry of Women and Child Development (WCD) and Textiles has decided to launch Bharatiya Poshan Krishi Kosh (BPKK) on 18th November 2019 in New Delhi. The BPKK is the repository of diverse crops across 128 agro-climatic zones in India for better nutritional outcomes.
